author: Nordzin Pamo
comment: Daily activities are recorded accurately and it is useful for keeping track of these. I am finding it helpful in managing my time for this. Anything set for a week though does not work. For example: task set for 1 hour a week. 20 minutes Monday, 10 minutes Tuesday, and so on - the task will not go green when I have accumulated an hour. Alternatively, more than an hour on Monday - goes green for that day, but then returns to red on Tuesday even though completed  week's task. PLEASE FIX THIS.
title: Glitches need sorting out

author: Daniel O'Donovan
comment: The app doesn't work correctly for weekly tasks. For instance if I say 1 hour a week and do 20m one day and 40m another it should show as done. However it only shows as done if the whole hour happens in one day. This bug has been present for a nearly a year.

Very good idea and use interface. However the Activites of the same Cathegory does not sum up in the overview! Instead you have min, max and avg.? You would really want to sum upp time of the activities in one category. Otherwise the "time remaining" does not even make sense there. Fix this and it will be a really great app.
title: What?

author: O Smith
comment: Keeps track of my time and easy to use. But min/max settings don't function and no daily totals. I would like timer to turn on a programmed task time for min and off at max time. Lots of other good features

author: Connor Doherty
comment: With this type of app you need to have as much integration as possible. Pebble, Tasker is a great start. Unfortunately, it seems to be proprietary software, so I'll pass for now.

reply.author: Acquasys
reply.content: Hi. The app also supports Android Wear natively. Best regards.

title: Great idea; integration needed

author: A Google User
comment: Now it is not working on my Asus Ze601kl mobile kept writing developer months but no response

author: Manuel Torres
comment: Feel more organized 100%
title: Nice

author: Ivo Treszka
comment: An excellect app. No complaints.

author: Alexander Zelyk
comment: I bought this app only for pebble watch. But pebble app not usefull. I have many actions and spend a lot of time to find what i doing now. PLEASE ADD NAVIGATION LIKE A FOLDER, BECAUSE IN PHONE APP WE HAVE CATEGORIES

author: Joseph Gutin
comment: Great app, thanks! I would like to see  1. Subactivities.  2. In the report to be able to start from particular date and not only from now (and see daily / weekly / monthly  average for this  period).  3. In the grid view mode to keep the order of activities all the time - do not move active activity to the top-left.

author: Liz Goodchild
comment: This is an invaluable app that I can't live without! Would like to speak to the developer for more ideas to get it to the next level!
title: #1 Cheerleader!

author: PG Spencer
comment: Easy support for monitoring & scheduling daily activities.
title: Time & activity monitor & schedule

author: Cheryl Danner
comment: I wanted to keep track of how long I was spending on various different activities, and I tried several apps. Others were some combination of buggy, difficult to use, or aesthetically incompatible with my tastes. This app has a convenient interface and works consistently, with only occasional lag. And as a bonus, I just learned from the review below that I can run multiple timers! I also like that I can look at stats for a week or month but wish I had more info/flexibility with the views.
title: Best activity timer I've found

author: Hautai Greensill
comment: The posts and ratings and video made it seem like the best thing.  If there was a tour to take you through how to add tasks that would help as it would save time playing around to figure it out. Also there aren't many options for icons.  Thank you for telling me how to run tasks simultaneously it would be good if this was included in the tour. I cannot change the colour of the icons.  If it was easier to operate that would make it better.Disappointed:/.How do I get my money back? I already emailed ages ago.

reply.author: Acquasys
reply.content: Hi. You can turn on option "Multiple Timers" in app settings to have activities running simultaneously. Please contact us by e-mail if you need more assistance. Best regards.

title: Not as great as it seems

author: JD Mumma
comment: I thought it could only track one habit at a time, but the creator corrected me (see response below). Now if I walk (exercise) and conduct a coaching session (work) I get to record both simultaniously rather than only  chosing one or the other.

reply.author: Acquasys
reply.content: Hi. Please turn on option "Multiple Timers" in app settings to have activities running simultaneously. Best regards.

title: Great features!

author: Darius Mullins
comment: Apps has had issues since last update. Sent email but no response from developers.
title: Awesome

author: Jorge Toledo
comment: The best app in Android to help to manage and track your time it is easy and handy with a great set of graphics
title: Excellent app for tracking time of your life

author: Ande Crenshaw
comment: Timed all my tasks today. Super easy to use. Very revealing. Great app!
title: 1st day & I love it!

author: Derek Hofmann
comment: I like the Tasker integration (I have it start a timer when I open my language learning app and stop the timer when I close it), but I wish it would show my day's progress in Android 5.1's notification pull-down bar. It would also be nice if it supported subtasks.
title: Useful

author: Marie Ng
comment: Very well thought out. Love how well it syncs with Pebble. My only suggestion would be for different analytics. On the graph I'd rather see how I did on each day of week vs the average.
title: Love the pebble integration!

author: Evan Case
comment: Great app... a UI overhaul would go a long way.
title: Looks bad.

author: Ambient Frog
comment: Has helped me manage my day more effectively, the grid view is a great idea and keeps me focused on what's next.
title: Great time management app

author: Shasha White
comment: It will be cool to have option of having audio cues every 15 minutes. This will be cool
title: It will be cool to have option of audio cues every 15 minutes. This will be cool

author: Carlene Pachal
comment: I can't believe how easy it is for someone like me to be crazy productive with this app
title: Wonderful.

author: Cecelia Mayer
comment: This is such a good app for people with bipolar or add.
title: Excellent

author: Karol Nowak
comment: I found it accidentally and it's perfect :)
title: great app!

author: Jeff Birdman Spencer
comment: Layout is better, thanks
title: I updated

author: Aashish Priye
comment: Nice interface and easy integration with pebble

author: Cliff Stewart
comment: Fun App for Tracking Studies

author: Daniel Chavarria
comment: I've only been using this app for about two weeks, but it has already helped me realize where I'm wasting time and also keeps me focused when at work. Missing a star because of bug where sometimes I click an activity and it opens edit activity instead of starting the timer.
title: Great n=0 app

author: A Dashti
comment: The app is nice, however after I stop an activity it takes a while to stop and the duration is not accurate I keep editing duration from activity to another, usually decrease. Sony Xperia Z3 user.
title: Needs fixing

author: thada jirajaras
comment: I'll give you one more star if there's progress bar of minimum time for each task.

author: Jaynae Miller
comment: Keeps track of time brilliantly. Just learned I don't get enough sleep!
title: Great.

author: Roman Yusupov
comment: Nice app that lets you know how you spent your days
title: Awesome app. Gives you a hint on where your time goes.

author: Tylon Ross
comment: I'm more conscious of the time I spend
title: Timely

author: Elliot Moore
comment: Been looking for something like this for ages. Works as I'd hoped. Functional, efficient, bug free so far

There are no sync options!!!! ... So if my memory sd card gets full and  I have to copy over my sd card to my computer ... Or I lose my phone ....I lose all of my history on this app..  There is no way to download your history

reply.author: Acquasys
reply.content: Hi! There is a backup function in Menu/Tools. Please contact us by e-mail if you need any help. Best regards.

title: Nice concept...

author: Matthew Schock
comment: Excellent app. Overall a great app and asset to my time management. Highly recommended! Thank you.
title: Very effective time management tool/app.

author: Trevor Robinson
comment: Just starting to use on Galaxy Note2.   Will get back with you on this. ")
title: Don't Know Yet

author: Cosman Cuschieri
comment: Well thought out to be functional and easy to use. Reporting could be better though.
title: Does what it is designed to do
